p: For L929 cells, the leaf oil showed an IC 50 value of 542.2 μg/mL, while α-humulene presented an IC 50 of 577.4 μg/mL, very close to each other in fact ( Figure 2). The effects of the oEd and α-humulene tested on macrophages (RAW) were safe, at concentrations of 292.0 μg/mL and 405.9 μg/mL, respectively ( Figure 3). The other study using E. dysenterica leaves, described in the literature, showed similar results to cell viability [ 10].
